Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Finally a perfect place for a Brunch here in Amsterdam!

I really love it‚Ä¶ and recommend it! ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The coffee which was a blend of Brazilian and Ethiopian beans was perfection, best coffee I have had in Amsterdam and reminded me of the great Melbourne coffee‚Ä¶ the breakfast sandwich was divine and the Kim chi tacos were packed with ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The perfect place to stop by and eat your brunch. We had visited the Artis Zoo in the morning and were starving when found the Box Sociaal. We were welcomed by a nice guy that helped us with the menu choices. The burgers were tasty as well ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Recently I was just browsing Google Maps and I stumbled upon this amazing place. What a great spot to discover in Amsterdam! The crew is very friendly, attentive and genuine. The food is really good. Tastes great, quality and quantity are ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Service is super amazing, reaaaally friendly staff, brunch is delicious and the atmosphere is üëåüèª not the cheapest place but I think it‚Äôs worth it. There are vegan / vegetarian options üå±

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Delicious and friendly place. The Box Sociaal guys prepare various tasty egg dishes and perfect burgers. Also they can advise you well about the drinks. Very good value for the money.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Yummyyy!
The food was great and the staff are super nice. I would recommend going for brunch. Also they have outdoor seating area.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Awesome owners, waiters, nice affordable and tasty food. Possibilitu to choose veggie, meat or fish for dinner. For lunch is brunch so the menu is different, I wish they would have some dinner plates also for lunch. Environment is cozy, ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Delicious brunch, for a very reasonable price. Think about reserving, because they're quite booked. Even with a reservation, you might end up waiting 10min outside, but the waiters are nice enough to offer the drinks if so.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Always a great time at Box Sociaal.  The staff was friendly and attentive and, best of all, the food was great.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great find. The food was exactly as expected based on menu descriptions and portions are a nice size. The breakfast sandwich was super tasty. Also very cute (and young and anglo!) inside. Will definitely be back for brunch with friends or their pop up dinner events

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great coffee and absolutely delicious brunch! Will definitely frequent this spot.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Delicious Vegan and Veg options, great service and the cocktails wake you up and knock you out at the same time. Highly recommended and nowhere in Amsterdam like this. Thanks üôè

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Amazing place. The food was delicious and affordable. The waiters were very friendly and welcoming. An impeccable experience !

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Unreal food & drinks, staff were lovely. Worth the money!

We shared Kim‚Äôs Tacos & the apple tart pancake, was perfect for us. So good! ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: My favourite place in Amsterdam! The food is amazing, the drinks are as well, but really what makes me come back is the service. Such nice, friendly people who look like they enjoy what they do! ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Awesome! Thanks for helping to make our Australia Day awesome! The pies were delicious and way better than I‚Äôve ever had in NL or in Australia and that salad and the truffles, yum!  Thanks so much Alex and the team!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Order was done on time, and everything very well packed to take with me on the bike. The chicken Parmy could‚Äôve have had a bit more taste for my buds, but overall great food and nice service!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Great atmosphere, very friendly personnel.
Tea comes in a teapot and has loose leaves üëå Had a kater breakfast sandwich which was sloppy and delicious (as it should)
Would recommend!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great atmosphere and very helpful staff. We had a great brunch that turned into afternoon drinks and the staff was even kind enough to let us finish our drinks, after they had officially already closed. Will definitely come back!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: 10/10 would recommend. Great service. Great taste. Please book in advance; super easy to do via their website.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Cozy atmosphere & comfort food..what more can you possibly want for a brunch? Everyone is really nice and helpful. We were served fast and the food was delicious. Totally recommend this spot for a brunch / lunch

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Got the chicken burger. Nice fresh buns, felt home made with a crunchy chicken patty. Covered in tasty sauce. Burger and chips was enough for a fulfilling dinner.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Perfect for brunch, cocktails and good mindset

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Always greeted with warmth and welcoming smiles here. Wonderful original roasted coffee from Friedhats. A salivating-making menu that satisfies carnivores and vegans alike. Just a really cool place- cool people, relaxed vibe, focus on yumminess. Thank you

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Box social‚Äôs buttermilk burger & Bloody Mary can dust the cobwebs off the DUSTIEST of hangovers. Simply outstanding. Bravo

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Honestly somewhat mid, we came for dinner and had the fried chiken sandwich with fries. Chicken was dry and over fried, the rest of the sandwich was good. Fries mid, service mid. Had high hopes, hopefully we were just unlucky

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The food was just fantasic. One of the best breakfast I had

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Veg'o sandwhich is probably one of the best veggie burgers I have ever had. Eggs benny are also great, very interesting combination with the sauerkraut.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: One dish was 2 stars (eggs benedict) and one was 4 stars (Korean pancakes). Combined with service that struggled to keep up, the overall experience was 2 stars but with potential to be more. ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Easy way to reserve a table, great food and delicious drinks mixed with lovely staff and the background of some aussie accents - for me this might be the best place to get brunch in Amsterdam since it's as close as possible to perfect.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Very delicious food and they also have a lot of vegetarian options. A good place for breakfast or brunch, the volume is pretty big you will be full. But there are always a lot of people around, might be a bit noisy.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Friendly service, yummy breakfast options and really good coffee (long black, flat white, cappuccino no probs!). Veg options too. Nice open space inside and a relaxed crew. Will have to return to try the rest of the menu!!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: It was a bit of a trek out of the centre to get here, but we had bikes so didnt take too long. Its right near the zoo so you could head over there at the same time. ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: This place has had a consistently friendly service and good food with great coffee. Unfortunately it's now ruined by really terrible value for money. Which is a shame, as I liked this place. However the last three times I've been, I've had ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
üè° cozy place with a rustic design and great atmosphere, indoor-outdoor tables,
üçΩ is delicious, fresh products, high quality and is like a mixed mediterranean style, vegan is possible as well. Wine ecologic list ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: It was a busy Sunday brunch, so the food was a bit of a wait. But the staff were awesome, the vibe was cool and when the food eventually did arrive ;) it was amaaaaaazing! (Veggie breakfast sandwich for the win!) ‚ú®Highly recommend‚ú®

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Amazing place if you want to have a meal or a snack that is home made is high quality. Definitely recommend!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The food was amazing and the staff was super nice! The place is little but cozy üíõ we're definitely coming back for another brunch üåª

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Sorry to say but food was mediocre, atmosphere suffocating and service terrible. Too many tables are cramped in this tiny cafe and eventhough there is already VERY little room to walk or move we were asked to move our table even further to ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Incredible food in a fantastic location and with warm, welcoming staff. It really made my day and helped make the stay of my guests super memorable too. You guys rock!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Burgers, chicken sandwiches, breakfast sandwiches super yummy. Would have given 5 stars, but the chicken tenders were really overcooked.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The food was very delicious and the staff was super friendly and helpful. Also, when the waiting time for the pancakes was too long, they offered me to change my choice and also a free drink. How thoughtful! Will come back another time to try out the pancakes!!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Another great takeaway meal from Box Sociaal. They are constantly adapting to the changing landscape of horeca during this pandemic and they are rocking it. Tip: order takeaway/delivery directly from their website instead of a food delivery app so they profit the most during this difficult time.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great coffee. You can get free refill of filter coffee in the morning.  Shakshuka is fine but bread for it is very oily. There are some seats outside and inside. Service is nice.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: I used to order their delicious burgers during covid lockdown times but unfortunately they changed up there menu and don't deliver anymore. Curious as I was to see why they did this I went there to grab a bite and the reason was to get back ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Definitely one of the best in town and a must try in Amsterdam! Came here for brunch as it was highly recommended by locals for the delicious food. Ingredients were freshly sourced and everything on the menu was beyond amazing. Best coffee ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Phenomenal brunch restaurant! Really chilled vibe, really friendly on the ball service. Had the eggs Benedict pimped up with extras and a Negroni - both perfectly executed!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: This place blew me away. The staff was so friendly giving us recommendations on things we should do in the city. They were very personable and talked us through the different food options they offered. The people who were dining here were ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: A casual, young eatery with international, food and some Australian specials. We went for the Albert Heijn promotion and chose this place because of the a-la-carte choice instead of a pre-set menu, usually served for promotional purposes. The food was nice, well prepared, arrived on time and tasted freshly made. Service is friendly

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Good place to visit if you are in the area and looking for brunch. Coffee was 5 stars...almost as good as what you would find in Melbourne, Australia. The brunch was ok. Wasn't blown away but wasn't disappointed either. Would recommend the ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The food tasted really good and the chai latte was yummy as well. I had the crab croissant meal, very unusual and interesting dish but all flavours worked great together! My partner had the shakshuka with add ons which was very appreciated too.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Recently opened up but an instant classic. We went here for lunch (they also have a separate dinner menu) and really liked it. I had a burger which was really nicely done and super juicy. Would recommend stopping by if you're visiting Artis or even in your lunch break at the nearby University.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Very cool vibes, delicious food and tasty craft beer. Slightly expensive but you get what you pay for. Friendly cool staff

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Food is decent (only chicken) and they offer water without you even having to ask (an anomaly in Amsterdam!)

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Honestly love this place, we are here every week. Their service is second to none. Very friendly. And to boot: they are open every day even public holidays. Food here is delicious, recent menu update has some new classics like the Korean chicken burger. Get yourself a Bloody Mary, even off the booze the virgin version is delicious.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: This place was great, the food was good, service was good, decor was nice, I got the Shak Attack that was amazing (shakshuka), my husband got an open sandwich with avacado,  poached eggs, pepper, and tomatoes. For PB&J lovers they have a ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: I‚Äôm so glad I found out about this place. First of all, it‚Äôs wonderfully styled and decorated inside. The waiters and waitresses are some of the friendliest and most attentive ones I ever encountered. Now, the drinks: I tried two different ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Amazing cafe. This was my first stop in Amsterdam and it set the mood for my whole stay. Really great tea, juice, beer, and general drink selection. My coffee was wonderful, and my first waffle in Holland was delicious. Really nice staff to chat with and they play great music.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Staff are so friendly and food is different and tastes soo good

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The experience I had at this restaurant dates back to before lockdown, so I cannot speak for the current state of the place. ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: I never thought the perfect trifecta of brunch and coffee game would come to Amsterdam but this place is killer. Great eats, great coffee and genuinely epic staff. Have come a couple of times already and just everything on the menu is delicious. Finally!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Lovely place with friendly staff and very good food. Cool atmosphere with funky artwork. ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: I had high expectations coming here being recommended by a work colleague. The place looks nice, it has nice music, not too loud and the staff is very friendly. We were in a group of four and until we ordered everything was very good. ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: One of the best beef burgers I got to eat in a long time, but what really toom the ramplight was the chickenburger, it was absolutly delicious

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: A bit of Australia in Amsterdam. Felt like home. Fantastic customer service, really friendly staff, and great coffee. Waffles was also dynamite. Would definitely come back again when I am in Amsterdam. Give it a try!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Probably the best restaurant in Amsterdam. Amazing seasonal menu, healthy, great cocktails, fantastic service. Order everything it's all good.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: We had a great time at Box Sociaal! The welcome and the food were just perfect. Thank you for all this. We hope to visit you again, very soon!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Excellent place. Amazing food, very friendly and professional stuff. Loved it and will be back for sure.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Very hip brunch place in oost. Try their espresso Martini. Food looks better than it tastes. Would still come back tho

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The pie from the pop up store is delightful. really tasty food. I will be ordering from you again soon.üëç‚ù£

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Best in the business. Amsterdam‚Äôs best brunch and dining spot. Exceptional service - always leave with a smile on my face! Thanks guys üôèüèª

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: I was walking with my friend to a restaurant and it stopped to make dinner service so we wandered around and spotted Box Sociaal. We decided to try it. I can tell the waiter service is very good, also the food. The restaurant interior is very nice too. I recommend Box Sociaal for its concept.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Yummy yummy food and a huge selection. This is one of my favorite brunch places. I wish the dinner menu was offered all day so I could try some of their dinner options!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: We've eaten their take away a few times and everything we've gotten has been yum. Definitely recommend.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great staff, amazing food, tons of vegetarian options! I highly recommend eating here if you get the chance.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Delicious food and drinks. Great vibes. If I were a local this would be my go to spot. Brunch was a 10/10

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Best Parma this side of the globe. Great and friendly service. You can tell everyone has fun working here.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: A fantastic hidden gem of a restaurant. The food and the atmosphere are so inviting. Definitely a place to check out if you are in the area. Only tried their breakfast menu but will return for their lunch and dinner.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great food and great menu.  Who would of thought an Aussie Bondi influenced eatery would be thriving in East of Amsterdam.   The menu was great and the food superb.  The burger I had was fantastic but there are so many more interesting options.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: We had an amazing breakfast, I recommend the Benny and the Jets( eggs Benedict). The service was amazing and they had great lattes as well!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Food and service were sensational. Best brunch in Amsterdam. Would highly recommend

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great food, friendly staff; highly recommended!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great to have a place like this in the neighborhood. These guys know how to do brunch! Excellent food, fresh juice and friendly staff. Will try their dinner menu soon!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Located at a street corner with a nice view of the street. Ordered a Shak Attack but sadly the toasts were a bit overdone.. the shakshuka is also a bit too salty. Overall it didn‚Äôt look as good as other photos in the review.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The food was amazing and service fantastic ! The team is lovely, had a super nice moment,  I recommend 1000% !!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Easily the best Eggs Benedict ("eggs benny and the jets") I've ever had.

The staff are friendly, the service is top notch, and the food is delicious- ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Fantastic menu, great staff and casual atmosphere. I especially recommend the Korean Chicken Burger with a side of kimichi - delicious!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Amazing food. Everything we ordered was super tasty!
Highly recommended

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Fantastic new brunch place in east. Cosy atmosphere, friendly staff and bloody good food. Reminds me of Sydney brekky! #straya

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Stumbled across this place online when looking for a Sunday brunch whilst on a weekend trip to Amsterdam. Walked 30 min through the winter chill from our hotel looking for it. Could not have been more worth it! ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Great for brunch!
I love all the items the menu.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The waiter forget about my order, and than, about 30 minutes, came to me and ask ‚Äúdo you want something?‚Äù. French fries and burger were too oily and greasy. The cocktail was too diluted, so I didn‚Äôt feel the true taste of this drink.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Fantastic food. Excellent atmosphere, super chilled place for brunch...üëåüèºwill be back to try more of the menu next time!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Fantastic meal, fantastic staff, fantastic atmosphere, what more could you ask for.
We are just disappointed we left it until the last night to go here as we would have liked to have gone again..

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Super tasty breakfasts! Really kind and friendly staff.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The lava cake (first thing on the dessert list in the menu) is heavenly good. The actual cake was really fluffy and the chocolate with caramel was delicious. The space is a bit crowded and it got loud, but this cake is worth it!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Friendly team, delicious foods and cosy atmosphere. Definitely will come back again.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Drinks, food, staff and atmosphere was all excellent. After a great brunch we came back for dinner and it was equally as amazing. Can‚Äôt wait to get back

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: One of my favorite restaurants in Amsterdam. Consistently delicious food.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great food and service, they were very attentive around the food intolerance requirements. Excellent coffee.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Best place for lunch and dinner in Plantage! Well packaged for takeaway lunches and dinner during COVID times. Excellent menu and great quality! Those twice cooked fries...yum!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: We had the Thai box on tour this weekend and were honestly blown away by the food. Everything was so delicious, fresh and full of flavor and such a treat to still have that restaurant quality food while at home and waiting for restaurants ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: We took part in the pop-up brunch the first week of a return to terrace service... loved our experience and felt really good to be out and about again after lockdowns. Food was fantastic (benedict dishes for both of us, one salmon one bacon). Can't wait for the next one. Thanks to everyone for putting that together.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Super nice place! I had only a cappuccino and the delicious lava cake, but will definitely come by again. Staff is very friendly and the atmosphere is really great. Recommend it!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Lekker mates! Deffo a contender in the race for the best brunch of Amsterdam. Creative and delicious food, awesome vibes and super friendly faces. Hard recommend for anyone looking to find their new favorite brunch place!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The food is great and prices are fare

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Great breakfast and lunch food including many gluten free options. Tasty food and
Great service. Will be back.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Cute place for coffee and brunch. The food was cute and service was quite friendly. We waited a bit long for the food though.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: My new favourite brunch spot!! Great veggie options and a lovely atmosphere. Plus the staff are so so nice!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Overall delicious brunch & great atmosphere!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
The fishüëçThe chickenüëçüëç

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
The best brunch on the city!!!

Name: Box Sociaal

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Friendly staff, good cocktail list, and food, while not particularly unique, was tasty!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great food, great service, great vibe. Go here, you won‚Äôt regret it.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Not sure if I already reviewed this joint! It‚Äôs amazing! Good food, good coffee, GREAT service!!

Name: Box Sociaal

Review Text: Excellent food and presentation,  great service and wonderful people.

had a good stay , nice food & coffee

Went there for the burger and did not disappoint!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Super friendly staff and awesome food. Highly recommendable if you are in Amsterdam.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Delicious benny eggs, and great atmosphere.  The staff is extremely nice and fun.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great cocktails, good food. I'll come again and try out more of the menu.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: What a good surprise ! Staff was so nice with us, and the food was really good !

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Had breakfast here twice and it was lovely.  Hidden gem. Bit got a takeaway and was a little disappointed.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Best brunch in the Plantagebuurt. Excellent coffee from Amsterdam based Friedhats roastery. My favorite dish is the Veg'o Kater Breakfast Sandwich.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Amazing vibes, incredible vegan options, friendly and welcoming staff, 10/10 would recommend

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Always an absolute pleasure! Great food, great drinks, great service!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Good portions, good food. The girl serving is amazing

Review Text: Delicious ozzie brunch, perfect textures and crafted plates. I highly recommend this place!

Name: Box Sociaal

Review Text: Love this place! Cool guys, smooth music and awesome food üòãüòÅü§©

Review Text: Delicious food & lovely staff! Really enjoyed it‚úÖ

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Food was amazing, coffee was amazing, atmosphere is very relaxing and staff was great!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Food was fantastic. Neat atmosphere and great service. Highly recommend.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The food had us singing in the elevator it was so good. A delectable array of flavours, generous portions, beautifully presented. The menu was varied and very original.  The atmosphere is very relaxed and comforting. ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The place is small with about 40 seats and the layout is really nice. There is seating downstairs and up. There is a big sharing table in the middle and also seats across the bar and windows. The menu is short but had some nice Aussie and ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: What to say-  I just experienced  the burger of the week ‚Äúthe crispy calypso‚Äù it was an absolutely breath taking experience that I hope I can repeat again. Please keep on the menu it was delicious to say the least üèÜ

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: A warm welcome and tasty food. What more could you want from Sunday brunch

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Absolutely love this place! Great music, great atmosphere, great people. The food is also amazing! I highly recommend their Eternal Sociaalist burger (korean chicken burger). ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: I have been to this place twice and it has never disappointed me. Loved loved lived their Shakshuka..yummm!üòç

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Recommended as one of the best places to eat in Amsterdam and did not disappoint! ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Super friendly people! And really delicious burgers and fries. We had a burger based with miso-musterd on a homemade milk burger bun. One of the best burgers I've ever had!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Excellent service, eggs Benedict is just perfect!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: A nice and cozy place for late breakfast/brunch. Friendly staffüëçüèº the prices a little bit expensive.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: A gem in the neighborhood! Reminiscent of Australian brunch restaurants with a diverse menu and tasty food. In the evening they switched to mainly burgers (I miss the chicken parmy!), which are really good too. The wine and beer list is good, and the staff is so friendly!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Love it! Friendly and relaxed atmosphere, simple and tasty food! Will love to come back

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: My new neighbourhood go-to place for brunch/lunch! Delicious food, friendly staff, easygoing atmosphere, and diverse menu. Had the banh mi with pork belly the first time with no expectations and was actually quite impressed, both for the ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great food, great service

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Went multiple times over a week, all the food we got was very good and perfectly prepared. Their coffee is quite nice, and the staff was very helpful and friendly when dealing with my wife's allergy. The kombucha was a bit sweet for my tastes but a great place for breakfast!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THE OLD SWEET BOX SOCIAAL YOU USED TO KNOW... After this unfortunate COVID19 situation, we visited our fav place but apparently the management of the restaurant has changed and switched into a typical basic ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The food here was brilliant, we had two burgers and they were the best! The waitress was super friendly and attentive. The beer on special was tasty too. Definitely coming back here again :)

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Really friendly waiting staff and the food was great.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Service is good! Very friendly people. Food is okay but the burgers are a bit overpriced for the quality IMO. I had the burger with chicken. The Mac and cheese fries are awesome though!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Good breakfast, good coffee and good ambience.  2 level sitting

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great food and drinks with super cool staff

Name: Box Sociaal

Review Text: Food takes long, especially around lunch time. But the taste is good.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Lovely brunch, creative and experimental menu. Great for dates, better for foodies.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Verry nice place 10/10

The service 10/10

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: I had already been here 2 times before for an exquisite brunch, so my expectations were quite high for my first Box Sociaal 'evening experience' during their Sociaal Sip wednesday evening. You get to taste 4 wines √°nd a burger for only ‚Ç¨25. ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Nothing but love at this place! Whether

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Perfect hotspot for food and delicious coffee. Very friendly staff, lovely Ozzie vibes. Great place for your hangover breakfast, a coffee with a friend or even a date. They serve very good cocktails. Many vegetarian options on the menu. Highly recommended if you are looking for an easy going place with great food!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Box Sociaal are still open for takeaway/delivery. Got a beer & burger box for dinner, it was great! Good portion size, tasty chips and burgers. Delivery was super quick, just 30 mins. We will be ordering again :)

Name: Box Sociaal

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: I loved it here! Get there early though because seating is an issue. The food was good and not just a regular Avo on toast! The staff were so friendly and helpful and food was tasty and not a along wait although I'm sure this might change if it's busy. Coffee was super tasty too! Can't wait to go back!!

Review Text:
If you cannot remember an order then write it down please!

Review Text: friendly staff, delicious food and beverages. will return for sure!

Name: Box Sociaal

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: We went there this week and it was an awesome experience. The staff made us feel very welcome,  the food was absolutely amazing and the tea and coffee were on point. This is easily the best place in Amsterdam we have been to. I'm impressed, ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great food and friendly service. I had the salat with chicken and it was delicious.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: I ordered the eternal sociaalist burger via delivery and received a completely pink and undercooked piece of chicken. I only noticed about a quarter way through the chicken that it is undercooked. What is worse, I sent a message to the ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
Box Sociaal sets the bar for Amsterdam brunch spots.
The staff are great, the food is consistently tasty and the menu is varied.
Meals don't come with a half-arsed piece of lettuce on the side, the chef knows ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The food is just absolutely and unquestionably AMAZING. I just wish I could have a bit of a longer stay in the city, so that I could come back here. Every single worker here is absolutely nice and polite, always making sure if you're happy and comfortable in general. Couldn't recommend it more. Worth every cent.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Lekker as! Best brunch in Amsterdam and a great team!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Friendly staff, the food looked and tasted great, cool atmosphere. Not cheap but the quality was worth the price, unlike other places nearby. Would recommend the veggie breakfast burger. Tasty and filling!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Box Sociaal has some of the best burgers in Amsterdam, always showing great art, and killer beer list to boot. Check it out, great for lunch or a casual date. Check out their Fried Chicken PopUp they have running as an additional menu.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: We visited this place based on the very good reviews. We went with no reservation but the staff found us a table easily. However we waited for almost one hour for our food to arrive. Food was good but nothing spectacular. Coffees were very ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great first visit - won‚Äôt be the last! Kater breakfast sandwich was really good!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: What I have to say ? AMAZING on quality, taste and presentation. Service is so kind. You really must to test it, it‚Äôs perfect !

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Had a quick dinner after work and will certainly come back. Friendly and attentive people and open on Monday! Burger was much, much better than other neighbourhood options with surprising house pickled beets that will bring me back just for ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Nice Aussie-style brunch option in the East. Good, simple menu with gluten-free options - they use a gluten-free good bread! A few mishaps with menu items but excellent service and they were quick to fix any issues. Cosy but open feel; I want to come back for dinner!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: We came here for dinner while evening while visiting Amsterdam.  The restaurant is set in the beautiful Waldorf Astoria hotel.  Definitely go early and grab a drink in their bar downstairs - there is a gorgeous garden that you can enjoy it in. The meal was amazing and whimsical- the service, the food, and the wine pairing

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
We went there for brunch and were pleasantly surprised by the DELICIOUS food, the great service, the helpful and kind waiters and heavenly coffees.
It's a cozy - not to big - place, so it might be better to make a reservation if you're a group. We'll certainly stop by again when we'll come back to Amsterdam.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great food, no uneccessary packaging for takeout and delivery, may need to return the cooking tray to restaurant, something I don't mind doing personally.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Food is class, service is as it should be (i.e. not typical Dutch bar standard which is awful), and the drinks menu is well set out. Great cocktails and beers alike. Most of all the vibe is friendly and you can literally pop in here any time of day!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Great food, exception service and amazing staff! The duck burger was tender and packed with flavor. I was asked several times how everything was and if I needed anything and the entire staff seemed to be enjoying their jobs.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: One of my favourite spots in Amsterdam: creative brunch specials with a twist, great natural wines and cocktails (try the stroopwafel espresso martini!) and a lovely staff that goes out of their way to make you feel comfortable. Must visit!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Absolutely gorgeous place for a very chilled food and drink experience. Lovely staff who are really welcoming and accommodating but totally relaxed too. The mango coconut bowl and iced coffee were delicious!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Super cool hangout with great food. The staff are lovely, and if you book through TheFork you get a cheeky 50% of your bill. Aside from that I‚Äôd still go here at full price, which isn‚Äôt that expensive by the way. Amazing starters, mains, and desserts, highly recommend.

Name: Box Sociaal

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Amazing food with great service. I highly recommend their coffee and shakshuka for brunch and an orange wine with a beef short rib for dinner! Menu full of delicious and diverse options. Especially vegetarian friendly. My new favorite spot on the Plantage. Owners üëåüèª

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Box sociaal has changed their menu and disappointed in quality . Gave an impression of cutting costs and compromising quality. I have been to box sociaal before. The old excellent dishes were missing. The restaurant talks of change. They are losing their loyal regulars.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The staff is so friendly ! And their food is pretty good. They have a complete menu with different drinks and natural wines. The atmosphere is chilled and good. A great place to work too :)

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Fabulous ambience, excellent service and great food. We arrived at 5pm and stayed till closing, it‚Äôs truly a great hangout. Homemade mayo with the salt and pepper squid was amazingly good as was the twice cooked chips with the homemade mayo ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text:
So happy this place opened! I have been three times in 4 weeks & had something different every time & not been disappointed!

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: The food is good. The staff is nice. When it's busy however the wait for a table, order and food was just way too long, over an hour. If you come when it's not too busy this place is 5 out of five

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: If you're looking for a place to go look no further, box sociaal is the whole package, from the trendy and friendly atmosphere to the breathtaking food not only in presentation but taste, this is definitely an experience that you will remember long after you've left. The cocktails are incredible as is the tea 100% would recommend.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Went when the opened at 9 am.  They were so friendly... great bacon, potatoes, fish, hollandaise... a fantastic Chemex type drip coffee... this is always the best coffee when you can find it.  Glad we made it before we left Amsterdam after a long weekend.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Just received our delivery via deliveroo, order #1806. Guys, that‚Äôs inappropriate to find bones in the burger‚Äôs cutlets, also buns were overfried. My ‚Äúeternal socialist‚Äù burger had too little sauce in it. ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Small place with very friendly staff and delicious brunch options - both the shashuka and the ricotta pancake were great! Good selection, including vegetarian options and tasty drinks.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: So good, so delicious. Fresh kimchi was amazing. Silken tofu a delight. Oozing chocolate to die for. And a secret handshake from our very friendly waiter! Must come back.

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: If there's one thing that makes Box Sociaal stand out, it's the incredibly friendly service! Food is really tasty, but I do find it quite pricey. One brunch/lunch platter is fine, but the supplements are a bit out of proportion (‚Ç¨2,50/‚Ç¨3 to ‚Ä¶

Name: Box Sociaal
Review Text: Self explanatory ! Best coffee & food in Plantage. Go support your amazing local OZ cafe/bar/diner! Super nice staff & always happy to crack a joke! THE  BEST! Thanks guys!

Review Text: Very nice restaurant near UvA and Artis. The staff here are amazing, super attentive and cheerful. Well worth a visit.

Name: Box Sociaal
